resources.string: Welcome! Please log in using buttons below.
You have been logged in successfully!
This app purpose is to help you revisit your past memories.
You can do this by uploading your photos using the menu on the left hand side.
For help with using this app, please tap the button \'Help\' which you can find by tapping left top corner of the screen at any time.
If the text is too small, please press the button below. This will take you to the system accessibility settings where you can change screen and font size.
Select from your favourite photos and upload them here
Viewing your added media is just one click away
...and experience how photos recall your distant memories
